main event: A weatherman and fourteen others spotted a shiny, saucer-shaped object in the sky over Sioux City, Iowa.
interesting points: The object was initially thought to be a weather balloon,The object was reported to be moving at tremendous speeds of 10,000 to 12,000 miles per hour,It was described as shiny and pencil-shaped,The object disappeared from sight in just a second and a half,Air Force officials denied any knowledge of the saucer reports.
witness description: A weatherman and fourteen other individuals, including employees from the U.S. Weather Bureau.
